column8: Fairmont Gold King NS WC Accessible - Full wheelchair access. Grab bars at shower and toilet. Detachable shower head. Clearance under sink. Fire alarm strobe lights. Each Fairmont Gold room has been elegantly designed with today’s chic, sophisticated traveler in mind. Guests of Fairmont Gold receive complimentary Internet, daily breakfast, evening hors doeuvres, and club access. Each guest room features elegant furnishings with touches of crown molding, curated art, and a soothing color scheme which exudes a modern feel with classic influences. Enjoy Nespresso Coffee to ensure a relaxing stay in your home-away-from-home. Location: 4th FloorBeds: 1 KingSize: 300-350 sq ft, 28-32 sq mView: Interior facadeIf guest requests a bathtub in room, please ensure you place in appropriate comments field on reservation.Only residents (guests) that book Fairmont Gold have access to the Fairmont Gold lounge. Residents are not allowed to bring non-Fairmont Gold guests to the lounge area.

Presidential Suite King NS - Our most magnificent guestroom is a suite suitable for royalty. Modeled after the incredible brownstone homes of Back Bay, this Boston suite consists of three elegantly decorated rooms, each with custom-made furnishings. The marble entry foyer leads into an expansive living room with a decorative fireplace. Just off the living room is a luxurious dining room offering a table with seating for ten, as well as a butler's pantry and additional half bath. The large bedroom features a hand carved four-poster bed and a chaise lounge for enjoying the view of beautiful Copley Square. The suite also includes large closets, separate dressing area, and a full marble bathroom with soaking tub.Location: 5th floor, front-facing, center of buildingBeds: 1 King; Sofa is not pullout bedSize: 1600 SQ FT, 149 SQ MView: Copley Square park viewHOW TO BOOK WITH OWNIT1. Any BAR, non-qualified or qualified rate in the CRS is eligible for a OWNIT POF. A maximum of 100.00 USD in POF elements, per night, can be added. Include comments detailing what OWNIT POF elements were offered. DO NOT disclose any amounts to the guest.2. When booked send a Reservation Special Request using the Specialty Suite-Cabin notification 3. Also note on the Reservation Special Request a customized email confirmation is required. DO NOT send a CRS email confirmation.

The suite also includes large closets, separate dressing area, and a full marble bathroom with soaking tub.Location: 5th floor, front-facing, center of buildingBeds: 1 King; Sofa is not pullout bedSize: 1600 SQ FT, 149 SQ MView: Copley Square park viewHOW TO BOOK WITH OWNIT1. Include comments detailing what OWNIT POF elements were offered. DO NOT disclose any amounts to the guest.2. When booked send a Reservation Special Request using the Specialty Suite-Cabin notification 3. Also note on the Reservation Special Request a customized email confirmation is required. DO NOT send a CRS email confirmation.

Presidential Suite King NS - Our most magnificent guestroom is a suite suitable for royalty. Modeled after the incredible brownstone homes of Back Bay, this Boston suite consists of three elegantly decorated rooms, each with custom-made furnishings. The marble entry foyer leads into an expansive living room with a decorative fireplace. Just off the living room is a luxurious dining room offering a table with seating for ten, as well as a butler's pantry and additional half bath. The large bedroom features a hand carved four-poster bed and a chaise lounge for enjoying the view of beautiful Copley Square. The suite also includes large closets, separate dressing area, and a full marble bathroom with soaking tub.Location: 5th floor, front-facing, center of buildingBeds: 1 King; Sofa is not pullout bedSize: 1600 SQ FT, 149 SQ MView: Copley Square park viewHOW TO BOOK WITH OWNIT1. Include comments detailing what OWNIT POF elements were offered. DO NOT disclose any amounts to the guest.2. When booked send a Reservation Special Request using the Specialty Suite-Cabin notification 3. Also note on the Reservation Special Request a customized email confirmation is required. DO NOT send a CRS email confirmation.

Two Bedroom Suite - Similar to having your own luxurious Back Bay home. These spacious, well appointed suites include 2 spacious bedrooms, 2 marble bathrooms, and separate elegant living room, perfect for entertaining. Each suite has been newly renovated to reflect a chic, contemporary design that offers the glamour of the past with modern features and amenities. These suites overlook Copley Square and the parks architectural landmarks, the Boston Public Library and Trinity Church. The majority of two Bedroom Suites at Fairmont Copley Plaza have one King in one bedroom and 2 Double beds or 1 King bed in the second bedroom.  Location: Corner or front of buildingBeds: King + King or 2 Doubles or 2 QueensSize: 1200 sqfView: Copley Square, Park ViewPRE-BOOKING INSTRUCTIONSPlease quote the rate of the MKN + DD2N or DKN or HQ2N.  If guest accepts and they are arriving with 72 hours or more, GRC can confirm the 2 bedroom suite if both the Suite and Deluxe category room is available. If it is less than 72 hours prior to arrival, call the hotel to confirm connecting. Guarantee connecting for one-time $100 fee. HOW TO BOOK1.  Book the MKN2.  Place 2S and D3 in specials3.  In comments place 2 Bedroom Suite approved by Name of Hotel Colleague4.  Book using the Itinerary DD2N or DKN or HQ2N5.  Do not discount any of the rates6.  Give guest confirmation number7.  Do not send CRS confirmation8.  Send Reservations Special Request using the 2 Bedroom Suite notification.

Alpine Suite King - Brand new to the Fairmont Chateau Whistler are the 600 square foot Alpine Suites. Two Bedroom Valley View Ste - Newly Renovated at the end of 2018, Spacious Suite with spectacular view of Rainbow Mountain, 1200 sq ft private bedroom with 2 Queen Beds and private bedroom with 1 King bed are separated by a living room with fireplace and 1 DBL Sofabed, 3 bathrooms, 3 TVs, NS, HSIA.Location: floors 5 and 7 Beds: 1 King + 2 Queen beds + Dbl SofabedSize: 1200sq ft - 111 sqm View: Valley Side View HOW TO BOOKPlease note that you NO LONGER need to call the hotel to check for the suite connector availability. If you see a TKN open to book, this means a 2 Bedroom Valley Suite is available to book1.  Book one TKN you no longer need to book the connecting rooms2.  Quote the rate of TKN only, under whichever promotion is sold to the guest and based on the number of adults children it will be hosting.3.  Note in CRS remarks: 2 Bedroom Valley Suite4.  Insert specials code 2S this code will flag reservations at CWR to block the appropriate rooms.The suite features three televisions, three bathrooms, three mini bars, a round sitting table, coffee table and three writing desks.

Signature View Two Bedroom Suite - The Suites offer HSIA. The suite portion has a master bedroom that can be closed off from the living room for more privacy- a dining area with a table for four - built-in wet bar and armchairs. Connecting bedroom is spacious.Location: Floors 18-36Beds: KG+KG+Sofabed, or KG+DBL+DBL+SofabedSize: 1090 sq ft View: Signature Views of Chicago, Lake Michigan or Millennium ParkHOW TO BOOK1. The rate equals the rate of both rooms added together: Do not discount the rates. Please leave each room at its valued rate. 2. Book one of the following pairs of rooms - using Itinerary in the CRS: MK1N+DKN, MD2N+DKN, MK1N+HK1N, or MD2N+HK1N3. Add the special request codes CN and 2S in each segment.4. Add the comment 2-Bedroom Suite. 5. Give the guest the confirmation number.Connecting bedroom is contemporary with Warwick Orme artwork. Each bedroom offers a marble bathroom with separate walk-in shower with rainfall-style shower head and marble bathtub and large closets and full-length mirrors.

Two Bedroom Fairmont Suite - The Two-Bedroom Suites offer HSIA. The suite portion has  master bedroom that can be closed off from the living room for more privacy a dining area with a table for four built in wet bar armchairs.Connecting bedroom is spaciousLocation: Floors 5-12Beds: 1 King + 1 King or DBL DBL + 1 King Size: 1090 sq ft View: Lakeshore East Park and Partial Lake ViewHOW TO BOOK1. The rate equals the rate of both rooms added together: Do not discount the rates. Please leave each room at its valued rate. 2. Book one of the following pairs of rooms  using Itinerary in the CRS: UK1N + CKN or UD2N + CKN.3. Add the special request codes CN and 2S in each segment.4. Add the comment 2 Bedroom Suite. 5. Give the guest the confirmation number.The connecting bedroom is exceptionally spacious and contemporary with Warwick Orme artwork. Each bedroom offers a marble bathroom with separate walk-in shower with rainfall-style shower head and marble bathtub and large closets and full-length mirrors.

The rate equals the rate of both rooms added together: Do not discount the rates. Please leave each room at its valued rate. 2. Book one of the following pairs of rooms  using Itinerary in the CRS: UK1N + CKN or UD2N + CKN.3. Add the special request codes CN and 2S in each segment.4. Add the comment 2 Bedroom Suite. 5. Give the guest the confirmation number.The connecting bedroom is exceptionally spacious and contemporary with Warwick Orme artwork. Each bedroom offers a marble bathroom with separate walk-in shower with rainfall-style shower head and marble bathtub and large closets and full-length mirrors.

Two Bedroom Fairmont Suite - The Fairmont hotel suites are spacious and elegant.The Warm inviting decor is accented by bold finishes. The luxurious marble bathroom offers deluxe products as well as plush bathrobes and over-sized ultra fluffy towels - HSIA.Location:Location is not guaranteed on request onlyBeds:King plus Queen plus full size sofabed or king plus Dbl Dbl plus full size sofabedSize: 1050 SQ FView: City skyline HOW TO BOOK1. Quote the rate based on the following combinations:South Tower: AK1N plus CQ1NNorth Tower: AK1N plus CD2N2.  Book both segments using itinerary3.  Discount the regular room to 0.00 and put the full rate on the suite. 4.  Add special code D3 and in the Comments in CRS write 2 Bedroom Suite5.  Place comments in reservation as to which tower the guest is requesting. 6.  Fill out special request form to communicate suite booking to hotel.7.  Call the hotel to confirm connecting for same day arrivals.

Signature Suite King - Drawing inspiration from the local arts community, the Signature Suite offers a one-of-a-kind artistic sensory experience. The unique decor of the suite pairs modern elegance with rare vintage treasures, including a 1930s era sofa and re-purposed red oak hardwood floors. The suite features magnificent custom pieces of artwork from each artist who has previously participated in The Fairmont Dallas Artist-in-Residence program through which breakthrough local artists are selected to reside in the hotel and work onsite for a three-month period. Guests are invited to peruse a special commemorative book detailing the history of the suites featured artists, artwork and furniture. Suite also includes access to Fairmont Gold Lounge and Breakfast in the Gold Lounge. Arts District Suite is located in North Tower, room 1221, downtown view.Location: 12th floor North Tower Beds: 1 Plush King Bed Size: 700 total sq. ft. Parlour is 22 x 18 with a 16 x 24 bedroom View: City skyline view

Signature Suite King - Drawing inspiration from the local arts community, the Signature Suite offers a one-of-a-kind artistic sensory experience. The unique decor of the suite pairs modern elegance with rare vintage treasures, including a 1930s era sofa and re-purposed red oak hardwood floors. The suite features magnificent custom pieces of artwork from each artist who has previously participated in The Fairmont Dallas Artist-in-Residence program through which breakthrough local artists are selected to reside in the hotel and work onsite for a three-month period. Guests are invited to peruse a special commemorative book detailing the history of the suites featured artists, artwork and furniture. Suite also includes access to Fairmont Gold Lounge and Breakfast in the Gold Lounge. Arts District Suite is located in North Tower, room 1221, downtown view.Location: 12th floor North Tower Beds: 1 Plush King Bed Size: 700 total sq. ft. Parlour is 22 x 18 with a 16 x 24 bedroom View: City skyline view
